ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Stun/root
ygData.msgSnippet: are you sure it s level-dependent?  maybe in the 30s is when you fought some green stuff that ran earlier than we are used to.  i don t think it has anything
ygData.messageBody:
are you sure it's level-dependent? maybe in the 30s is when you fought some
green stuff that ran earlier than we are used to. i don't think it has
anything to do with level. i think simply anything chained that is running
away will stop running at 50% health. they could be running because they
are very green to you, or you can be forcing them to run with fear.
anything that runs at all at 50% health or less will stop if chained, i.e.
even if a white con runs away at 5% health of its own accord (no fear), it
will stop when chained. if it just so happens to run at 50% health or is
feared then, it will stop when chained.

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L45 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> Early on Chain acts pretty much like snare. But later (level
> thirty-something?) it will stop runners when they're at half
> hp. That makes it superior to snare for stopping green
> runners, since greenies tend to run when they drop below half.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
